name: 3xcalibur Ecosystem Token
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: XCAL is the 3xcalibur Ecosystem Token. Issued on Arbitrum as a standard ERC-20 token. It can be vote-escrow locked into veXCAL for variable lengths and it serves multiple purposes such as: accruing platform fees and bribes, voting on gauges and being the de-facto governance token.
